description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a, line 5. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Mild staining. Incipit (commentary, leaf 1a, line 7): قوله الطهارة فالوضوء ىحب للواجب من الصلوة والطواف
author: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
abstract: Commentary on the treatise on Islamic law of Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī. Missing at least one leaf at the beginning; text breaks off in the middle of maqṣid 3.
extent: 205 leaves : paper ; 252 x 194 (182 x 127) mm bound to 255 x 205 mm
title: Jāmiʻ al-maqāṣid fī sharḥ al-Qawāʻid.
creator: محقق الثاني، علي بن الحسين، 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
